name: rhd-frontend
description: Front-end assets and documentation for Red Hat Developer site

scripts.start: npm run build && npm run docs
scripts.test: npm run scripts && karma start src/tests/unit/config/karma.conf.js
scripts.build: npm run scripts && npm run styles
scripts.del: npm run del:scripts && npm run del:styles
scripts.scripts: npm run del:scripts && npm run scripts:tsc && npm run scripts:old && npm run scripts:copy
scripts.scripts:copy: copyfiles -u 4 "dist/js/src/scripts/**/*" src/docs/static/js && copyfiles -u 3 "dist/js/node_modules/**/*" src/docs/static/js && copyfiles -u 2 "dist/js/*.js" src/docs/static/js
scripts.styles: npm run del:styles && npm run styles:sass && npm run styles:copy
scripts.styles:sass: node-sass src/styles/ -o dist/styles/ && node-sass src/styles/ -o dist/styles-min/ --output-style compressed && postcss -o dist/styles-min/rhd.min.css dist/styles-min/rhd.css
scripts.serve: npm run start && browser-sync start -c browser-sync.config.js
scripts.docs:front: npm run docs:styles && npm run docs:scripts
scripts.hugo: npm run start && hugo server -D -w -s src/docs --config src/docs/config.dev.toml

author: <ldary@redhat.com>
